Posts.EditableText:
I spent a while making a game and considered it to be good.Its in two parts and its NOT a demo,and yet,the game wasnt added to the archive.The games is called THE STONE -OF- ANCARDIA.Its about a young elf,on a quest to find the stone of ancardia and trap an evil wizard in a barren land in the darkest corners of ancardia.
         so i was wandering,if this game cant be added to the archive,why are there games rated poor on the website?

Posts.EditableText:
When did you try to add the game? There might be a delay while Alex checks it before uploading it.

[quote:39eoj2fh]why are there games rated poor on the website?[/quote:39eoj2fh]

Whatever your game is like, it's got to be better than some of the drivel that's on the games page. Give a copy of Quest to a bunch of monkeys and they'd probably churn out something better.
